segments.text: I see the woman continue her task, completely unaware of the mess forming beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How is it possible to focus so hard without noticing the world falling apart?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink spreads like a creeping vine, claiming the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel anger bubbling up inside me at the thought of a mishap waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These children are playing a risky game, and she is the unknowing referee.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a wave of sympathy for her; she’s just trying to keep everything running smoothly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But at what cost? I can’t shake the feeling that disaster is just a moment away.
segments.speaker: PAR
